title: Calories in 3 Slices of Bacon
meta_description: Discover calories in 3 slices of bacon, including protein, fat, sodium, full nutrition breakdown per slice, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard pork bacon, pan-fried until crisp, medium thickness (~8g per slice uncooked), excess fat drained; no added seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, thickness, cooking method (e.g., oven vs. pan), and fat drainage. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: Three slices of cooked bacon contain ~129 kcal and ~9 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.
